about.experience:
Engineering and Computer Sciences student at UniBo (Cesena Campus).
Participant in the Erasmus+ program in 2024 at NTNU (Norwegian University of Science and Technology)
I worked with RoBee, the first Italian cognitive humanoid robot.
You can download my CV here.
about.quote: I am passionate about programming in all its forms. I enjoy solving problems and challenging myself.

portfolio.paragraph: Most of the projects I have worked on, both academic and personal, are publicly available on my GitHub profile.

fintech.title: Fintech App
fintech.description: A cross-platform Revolut-like app built with React Native for the "Cross-Platform Applications Development for Mobile Devices" course at NTNU (A.Y. 2024/25).

website.title: Code for this website
website.description: This page was created based on a template using JavaScript + React, a framework for building user interfaces.

tbooop.title: TBOOOP! A demake of "The Binding of Isaac"
tbooop.description: A video game created for the "Object-Oriented Programming" course (A.Y 2023/24).

risikodb.title: RisiKoDB: a management system for "Risk!" games
risikodb.description: An application created for the "Databases" course using Unity and the .NET framework (A.Y. 2023/24).
